flexiPay.title: Flexible Payment Options Available
flexiPay.discounts: Any discounts will be applied at checkout.

couponCode: Remember to apply coupon code at checkout: {{coupon}}

enterpriseB2b.title: Thank you for your interest in the program.
enterpriseB2b.greetingTxt: You will receive an email with a link to the program brochure and next steps.
enterpriseB2b.emailContactDetails: Have questions about the course or how to enroll? Email us at group-enrollments@emeritus.org. We attempt to respond to inquiries as quickly as possible, but please allow 24-48 hrs for response.
enterpriseB2b.policyContactDetails: Please contact your manager or HR business partner.
enterpriseB2b.applyContactDetails: enterprise.clientsuccess@emeritus.org. We attempt to respond to queries in 24 hours or less. However, over weekends and holidays, our responses may take up to 72 hours.
